publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-635 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Mozambique and International Rescue Corps—That the Parliament congratulates the International Rescue Corps personnel and their volunteers who have made themselves available for service in Mozambique with the resolute determination to save life.

S1M-635 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Mozambique and the International Rescue Corps—That the Parliament congratulates the International Rescue Corps personnel and their volunteers who have made themselves available for service in Mozambique with the resolute determination to save life.
S1M-635 Mozambique and the International Rescue Corps (lodged on 6 March 2000) David Mundell*
S1M-635 Mozambique and the International Rescue Corps (lodged on 6 March 2000) Mr David Davidson*

S1M-635 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Mozambique and the International Rescue Corps—That the Parliament congratulates the International Rescue Corps personnel and their volunteers who have made themselves available for service in Mozambique with the resolute determination to save life. Supported by: Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, David Mundell, Mr David Davidson, Mr Jamie McGrigor*
